abstract: Since the fall, many marketers have been appealing to worried consumers by acknowledging that times are tough.
snippet: Since the fall, many marketers have been appealing to worried consumers by acknowledging that times are tough.
lead_paragraph: Forget the fancy blandishments of Madison Avenue. An e-mail message sent on Thursday to advertise B. R. Guest Restaurants gets right to the point.

headline.main: Creative Spots, Courtesy of a Stalled Economy
headline.print_headline: Creative Spots, Courtesy of a Stalled Economy
